definition: Xiaodian district of Taiyuan city 太原市[Tai4 yuan2 shi4], Shanxi

sentences.english: The clip-clop of horses' hooves came closer and stopped right in front of the inn.
sentences.chinese: 嘀嘀噠噠的馬蹄聲越來越近就停在小店門前。

sentences.english: He founded in 1998 Xiaodian District essence auto repair shop.
sentences.chinese: 他於1998年創立小店區精華汽車修理廠。

sentences.english: We slid into a booth or we conversation picked up where it left off ago.
sentences.chinese: 咱們拐進了一家路邊小店，接着上次的話題聊了起來。

sentences.english: William worked in his father's shop until his talent for drawing became so obvious.
sentences.chinese: 威廉在父親的小店幫忙直到他的繪畫才能鋒芒畢露。

sentences.english: What about going to Nu Ren Jie? There are a lot of clothes stores there.
sentences.chinese: 去女人街好不好？那裏賣衣服的小店特別多。

sentences.english: The small shop across from the bus stop is Mr. Wang's.
sentences.chinese: 汽車站對面的那家小店是王先生開的。

sentences.english: His restaurant has two storeys , sells orthodox western-style food, and most famous as its Pizza.
sentences.chinese: 小店分上下兩層，專營正宗西餐，尤以比薩最出名。

sentences.english: Brothers tobacco pipe, this is on the drum tower avenue a multi-faceted shop.
sentences.chinese: 兄弟菸斗，這是鼓樓大街上頗具特色的一家小店。

sentences.english: Quaint shops still has its lights.
sentences.chinese: 古雅的小店依舊燈火闌珊。

sentences.english: Alan Smith and his wife run a small shop in a small town.
sentences.chinese: 艾倫史密斯和妻子在一個小鎮上經營一家小店。

sentences.english: When I was a kid, my neighborhood streets were lined with mom-and-pop stores.
sentences.chinese: 我小的時候，鄰近的街道都是家庭經營的小店。

sentences.english: For ocean views without the motion sickness, set up shop on a remote island.
sentences.chinese: 想要看海又不想暈船，就找個偏遠的海島開家小店吧。

sentences.english: The supermarket might be cheap but the corner shop is handier.
sentences.chinese: 超市或許價格便宜些，但小店買東西更方便。

sentences.english: Streets surrounding the German quarter are filled with cafes and boutiques.
sentences.chinese: 德式建築周圍的街道滿是咖啡館和小店。

sentences.english: Shopkeepers buy wholesale and sell retail.
sentences.chinese: 小店主整批買進再零售出去。

sentences.english: 00 pm - Walk along the wharf and shop in boutiques along the way.

definition: customer area of a store/showroom/dining area of a restaurant
